Text.Page:
, I'm tired of excuses from everyone around here. "The faeries make logging impossible!" "We can't meet our quota!" "My arm's cut off!" Boo hoo!

Now, my foreman, Weldon, says he can't fix a simple broken bridge! What a whiner.

Take these tools to him at the Woodcutter Palisade, would you?

Maybe then, he can figure out a way to get some timber out of the woods.

Lennert is out of his mind! He's a problem-solver...for problems I don't have. I send messages like "the centaurs trampled my entire crew and ruined the bridge," and what do I get? A shipment of new axes and saws!

Nothing's gonna get done around here until the forest creatures settle down.

Can you lend a hand, ? I'll never get anything useful out of Lennert.
